sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

function Nav() {

    const handleNavigation = (sectionId) => {
        document.getElementById(sectionId).scrollIntoView({ behavior : 'smooth'});
      };

  return (
    <>
       <header className="fixed top-0 left-0 w-full bg-gray-900 text-white z-50">
        <nav className="container mx-auto p-4 flex justify-center space-x-4">
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('Inicio')} className="hover:underline">
            Inicio
          </button>
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('Tecnologías')} className="hover:underline">
             Tecnologías
          </button>
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('proyectos')} className="hover:underline">
            Proyectos
          </button>
          <button onClick={() => handleNavigation('contacto')} className="hover:underline">
            Contacto
          </button>
        </nav>
      </header>
    </>
  )
}

export default Nav
